English: Give Autonomy to the Irishman
After the fall of the Irish republic, we shouldn't fall into our old imperialist ways but grant them an equal seat among the union of the Brits
The One and True government
The exiled monarchy has finally been ended and with it we are the sole uncontested government of the british people
Restore Ottoman rule in Egypt
Egypt has broken away from us after a relativly succesfull campaing of Napoleon the Great in land of the pharoes, but the time has come to get it back
Domination in the Maghreb
As the sole muslim great power we should protect our brothers in faith in the Maghreb
Expand the Confederacy
Although we have faced setbacks from the British, the time has come to once again reassert our dominion over India
Restore the Mughal Empire
The Mughal Empire has barely recovered off of it's giant losses in the 18th century, but now we stand again as a gloruious nation and we shall claim our place in the sun
Incorporate Peru
Let us expand and continue the Bolivarian dream of a united Latin American republic, starting with the incorporation of Peru
United Latin American Republic!
The Dream of Bolivar's is so close to being achieved, finally we may stay equal to the great powers of the world as he wished
Restore Order in Central America
The funny rebelious states to our south think they can endure in peace, but soon they'll be proven wrong...
Integrate Central America
We should grant right to the Cenral Americans
Acquire Cuba
We should push the tyrannic Spaniards out of the Americas entierly and ensure our safety!
Regno unii
One Empire, two nations, one objective - expansion to liberate our brothers of foreign yoke
Move capital to Rio
We should move our capital to Rio, i heard you can meet a monke there
Restore the Persian Empire
Lands ripped away from us centuries ago are ought to be returned now that we're much more powerful
Restore the Spanish Empire in Europe
Lands ripped away from us centuries ago are ought to be returned now that we're much more powerful
Restore the Swedish Empire
Lands ripped away from us centuries ago are ought to be returned now that we're much more powerful
Long live the Queen!
We have forced the illegitimate government out at last! Long live the Queen!
The Indian Protectorate
Now that the so-called Mr. Madison's War is over, we should offer the Indian Confederation protection in case the USA decides to invade their lands
Annex the Indian Confederacy
A long time has come since the natives were brought under us, we should incorporate them further into our empire
Protectorate of New England
In the fight against the USA we should seize every chance we get so strengthen our position - a New English protectorate will serve this purpose
Partition Poland
We should repartition Poland again, they can't seem to govern themselves anyway
Jeszcze Polska nie zginela!
We should get rid of the useless title of the "Duchy of Warsaw" and call ourselves for what we are - Poles
Restore the Commonwealth Frontiers
Ruthenia was once lost to the Russians, but now we'll ensure such a mistake will never happen again
Second Union of Lublin
We are weak and surrended by enemies, we should propose to reunite with Lithuania in a peaceful manner
Restore the lands beyond the Rhine
Lands ripped away from us years ago are ought to be returned now that we're much more powerful
Unite the Kingdom of Westphalia
Many princedoms were given to us after the death of Napoleon the Great, the time has come to incorporate them properly into our realm
Westphalia has been consolidated
Form the Rhine Confederacy
Our dominant position in the area and favor with the French allow us to unite the German lands peacefully with a promise to coexist with our western neighbour
Create the Rhine Confederacy
Years ago Napoleon the Great created the Confederation of the Rhine, and now it is our job to help them unite under a single banner as they'll surely prove to be a great ally.
Assume the Crown of Italy
It is foolish that we call ourselves "The Kingdom of Italy" yet do not own all Italian lands, we should change that
Form Two Sicilies
Our dominant position in the area allows us to call ourselves "The Kingdom of Two Sicilies"
United Netherlands
Our dominant position in the area allows us to call ourselves "The United Kingdom of the Netherlands"
Partition Poland
We should repartition Poland again, they can't seem to govern themselves anyway
Restore what's ours
The proud Prussian people have endured living in a French-dominated world for too long! Now starts our rise to greatness!
Repartition Lithuania
We should repartition Lithuania again, they can't seem to govern themselves anyway
Conquer Finland
Acquiring Finland is of vital use to us as it protects our exposed capital
Conquer the Caucasus
The Caucasus is full of natural resources that are just waiting for us to use them!
Coronation of Napoleon III
Give up the Cause
We have failed to return to our original lands, perhaps we should establish a new Kingdom and begin a new journey to glory?
Napoleon's Legacy

The foolish compromises of Napoleon II have forced us to grant concessions to other European nations for the sake of peace. This great betryal must be amended, and the Legacy of Napoleon the Great must be reborn!
The Cromwellian Spirit
The republic is too unstable! As Cromwell did once, so shall we restore order and peace with a new Lord Protector, otherwise our enemies will prevail over us.
The Danzig Coup

The republic of Danzig is staffed with our officials friendly to us, our king must merely lift his finger and an annexation bill is sure to come. Let us erase this disgusting by-product of the Napoleonic wars and return the city to its rightful owner.
Create The Central Industrial Region

The Central Industrial Region was one of the biggest economic projects of the Poland. The 5-year-long project was initiated by a famous Polish economist, deputy Prime Minister and Minister of the Treasury, Eugeniusz Kwiatkowski. Its goal was to create a heavy industrial center in the middle of the country, as far as possible from any borders, strengthen the Polish economy and reduce unemployment.
The Grand Duchy

Our lands once stretched from the Baltic Sea to Kiev, until the traitorous Poles took them away from us and forced us into their bloody union! Finally being free of the fools, the time has come to retake our rightful lands.
Last stand!
WE shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight against the American menace!
Retake the Indian Treaty Ports

For ages, the Indian subcontinent has been plagued by the most terrifying disease - Europeans. With our control over South Asia solidified, we can afford to consolidate our power even more - and even attempt to drive out the Foreigners.
Form the Celtic Union
With our brothers under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ protection, we may finally embrace the Celtic identity and unite against England.
Finish what we Started!

With our nation sufficiently prepared against the English, now is the best time to strike. Let us liberate the people of Kernow and Manning!           §YResearching Nationalism and Imperialism allows you to discover Manifest Destiny.§!
Recover Brittany!

Brittany had endured under the French boot for hundreds of years. With our status as a formidable European power confirmed, the first step to helping the Bretons is to assert our claim on the Peninsula.
